entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to flurries after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
